title: Circle of the Moon
content: a +10 bonus to Stealth checks.Until Long RestConcentration Protection from Poison Lv 2 Abjuration ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot Touch a creature to grant it protection against poisonious influences.You neutralise all poisons affecting it, grant it Advantage on Saving Throws against being Poisoned, and grant it Resistance to Poison damage.Until Long RestMelee Spike Growth Lv 2 Transmutation ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot 2d4 PiercingShape a piece of ground into hard spikes. A creature walking on the spikes
